feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:07 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 12:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -11.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -16.5°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Flurries beginning this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 early in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
